Description: {{ product.description }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-item', templateUrl: './product-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-item.component.css'] }) export class ProductItemComponent { products = [...products]; share() { } onNotify() { window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); } }
